description:
Horizon using token to auth with nova client, but now it auth failed, logs can check this url:
https://murano-ci.mirantis.com/logs/63/422963/2/check/gate-murano-dashboard-ubuntu/17b566b/artifacts/devstack/horizon.log

full trace is here:

title: nova client using token auth failed

comments.content:
Horizon using token to auth with nova client, but now it auth failed, logs can check this url:
https://murano-ci.mirantis.com/logs/63/422963/2/check/gate-murano-dashboard-ubuntu/17b566b/artifacts/devstack/horizon.log
